member.name: T:Bastille.Id.Web.AppServices.AppServicesAuthenticationInformation
member.summary: Information about the App Services configuration on the host.

member.summary: The application services authentication enabled environment variable.

member.summary: The application services authentication open identifier issuer environment variable.

member.summary: The application services authentication client identifier environment variable.

member.summary: The application services authentication client secret environment variable.

member.summary: The application services authentication logout path environment variable.

member.summary: The application services authentication identifier token header.

member.summary: The application services authentication idp token header.

member.name: F:Bastille.Id.Web.AppServices.AppServicesAuthenticationInformation.AppServicesAuthDebugHeadersEnvironmentVariable
member.summary: The application services authentication debug headers environment variable.
member.remarks: Artificially added by library to help debugging App Services. See the Debug controller of the test app.

member.name: P:Bastille.Id.Web.AppServices.AppServicesAuthenticationInformation.IsAppServicesAuthenticationEnabled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is application services authentication enabled.
member.value: true if this instance is application services authentication enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Bastille.Id.Web.AppServices.AppServicesAuthenticationInformation.LogoutUrl
member.summary: Gets the Logout URL for App Services Auth web sites.

member.summary: Gets the ClientID of the App Services Auth web site.

member.summary: Gets the client secret of the App Services Auth web site.

member.name: P:Bastille.Id.Web.AppServices.AppServicesAuthenticationInformation.Issuer
member.summary: Gets the Issuer of the App Services Auth web site.

member.name: M:Bastille.Id.Web.AppServices.AppServicesAuthenticationInformation.SimulateGetttingHeaderFromDebugEnvironmentVariable(System.String)
member.summary: Simulates the gettting header from debug environment variable.

member.name: M:Bastille.Id.Web.AppServices.AppServicesAuthenticationInformation.GetIdToken(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.StringValues})
member.summary: Get the ID token from the headers sent by App services authentication.

member.name: M:Bastille.Id.Web.AppServices.AppServicesAuthenticationInformation.GetIdp(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.StringValues})
member.summary: Get the IDP from the headers sent by App services authentication.

member.name: M:Bastille.Id.Web.AppServices.AppServicesAuthenticationInformation.GetUser(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.StringValues})
member.summary: Get the user claims from the headers and environment variables.

member.name: T:Bastille.Id.Web.BastilleIdentityOptions
member.summary: This class represents the identity options for the Bastille Identity Web App library.

member.name: P:Bastille.Id.Web.BastilleIdentityOptions.EditProfilePolicyId
member.summary: Gets or sets the edit profile user flow name for B2C, e.g. b2c_1_edit_profile.

member.name: P:Bastille.Id.Web.BastilleIdentityOptions.SignUpSignInPolicyId
member.summary: Gets or sets the sign up or sign in user flow name for B2C, e.g. b2c_1_susi.

member.name: P:Bastille.Id.Web.BastilleIdentityOptions.ResetPasswordPolicyId
member.summary: Gets or sets the reset password user flow name for B2C, e.g. B2C_1_password_reset.

member.summary: LoginHint. Represents the preferred_username claim in the ID token.

member.summary: DomainHint. Determined by the tenant Id.

member.summary: Bearer. Predominant type of access token used with OAuth 2.0.
